name: Barbell Back Squat
description: A compound exercise that targets the muscles of the lower body and core.
instructions: Position barbell on upper back, squat down until thighs are parallel to ground, then push back up.

name: Push-Up
description: A classic bodyweight exercise that targets the upper body and core.
instructions: Start in plank position with hands shoulder-width apart, lower body until chest nearly touches floor, then push back up.

name: Dumbbell Bench Press
description: An upper body exercise that primarily targets the chest muscles.
instructions: Lie on bench with dumbbells held at chest level, press weights upward until arms are extended, then lower back to start position.

name: Plank
description: An isometric core exercise that strengthens the abdominals and back muscles.
instructions: Get into a push-up position but with forearms on the ground. Keep body in straight line from head to heels.

name: Deadlift
description: A compound strength exercise that works multiple muscle groups simultaneously.
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, bend at hips and knees to grip barbell, lift by driving hips forward.

name: Pull-Up
description: An upper body compound pulling exercise that targets the back and arms.
instructions: Grip pull-up bar with hands wider than shoulders, pull body up until chin clears bar, then lower back down.

name: Bodyweight Squat
description: A fundamental lower body exercise that works the legs and core.
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, lower body by bending knees and pushing hips back, then return to standing.

name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
description: An upper body exercise that targets the shoulder muscles.
instructions: Sit or stand with dumbbells at shoulder height, press weights overhead until arms extend fully, then lower back down.

name: Romanian Deadlift
description: A deadlift variation that emphasizes the posterior chain muscles.
instructions: Hold barbell in front of thighs, hinge at hips while keeping legs nearly straight, lower weight toward floor, then return to standing.

name: Bicycle Crunch
description: A dynamic core exercise that targets all the abdominal muscles.
instructions: Lie on back with hands behind head, alternate bringing elbow to opposite knee while extending other leg.

name: Lunges
description: A unilateral leg exercise that improves balance and targets each leg individually.
instructions: Step forward with one leg, lower body until both knees are bent at 90 degrees, then push back to starting position.

name: Burpees
description: A high-intensity full-body exercise that combines strength and cardio.
instructions: Start standing, drop into squat position, kick feet back into plank, do push-up, jump feet back to squat, then jump up.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: A dynamic exercise that targets the core while providing cardiovascular benefits.
instructions: Start in plank position, alternate bringing knees toward chest in running motion while maintaining plank position.

name: Dumbbell Rows
description: A pulling exercise that targets the back muscles and improves posture.
instructions: Bend at waist with dumbbell in one hand, pull weight up toward hip while keeping elbow close to body.

name: Jumping Jacks
description: A classic cardio exercise that gets the heart rate up quickly.
instructions: Start standing, jump feet apart while raising arms overhead, then jump back to starting position.

name: Russian Twists
description: A rotational core exercise that targets the obliques and improves rotational strength.
instructions: Sit with knees bent, lean back slightly, rotate torso from side to side while keeping feet off ground.

name: Bench Press
description: A compound upper body exercise that primarily targets the chest muscles.
instructions: Lie on bench with barbell at chest level, press weight up until arms are extended, then lower back down.

name: Wall Sit
description: An isometric exercise that builds leg strength and endurance.
instructions: Lean back against wall, slide down until thighs are parallel to ground, hold position with back against wall.

name: Lat Pulldown
description: A machine-based exercise that targets the latissimus dorsi muscles.
instructions: Sit at lat pulldown machine, grip bar wider than shoulders, pull bar down to chest while keeping chest up.

name: High Knees
description: A high-intensity cardio exercise that improves coordination and leg strength.
instructions: Stand in place, alternate bringing knees up toward chest in running motion while maintaining good posture.

name: Leg Press
description: A machine-based compound exercise that targets the lower body muscles.
instructions: Sit in leg press machine, place feet on platform, press weight away by extending legs, then return to start.

name: Tricep Dips
description: A bodyweight exercise that primarily targets the triceps muscles.
instructions: Support body on parallel bars, lower body by bending elbows, then push back up to starting position.

name: Calf Raises
description: An isolation exercise that targets the calf muscles.
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, raise heels off ground by pushing through balls of feet, then lower back down.

name: Bicep Curls
description: An isolation exercise that targets the biceps muscles.
instructions: Stand with dumbbells at sides, curl weights up toward shoulders while keeping elbows stationary, then lower back down.

name: Side Plank
description: A variation of the plank that targets the obliques and improves core stability.
instructions: Lie on side, prop up on one forearm, lift hips off ground to form straight line from head to feet.

name: Overhead Press
description: A compound upper body exercise that targets the shoulders and requires core stability.
instructions: Stand with barbell at shoulder level, press weight overhead until arms are fully extended, then lower back down.

name: Glute Bridges
description: An isolation exercise that targets the glute muscles and improves hip stability.
instructions: Lie on back with knees bent, lift hips off ground by squeezing glutes, hold briefly, then lower back down.

name: Seated Row
description: A machine-based pulling exercise that targets the back muscles.
instructions: Sit at rowing machine, pull handle toward chest while keeping chest up and shoulders back.

name: Jump Squats
description: A plyometric exercise that combines strength and explosive power.
instructions: Perform a squat, then explosively jump up, land softly, and immediately go into next squat.

name: Chest Flyes
description: An isolation exercise that targets the chest muscles through a wide range of motion.
instructions: Lie on bench with dumbbells extended above chest, lower weights in arc motion, then return to start position.

name: Yoga Downward Dog
description: A foundational yoga pose that stretches the entire posterior chain and builds shoulder strength.
instructions: Start on hands and knees, lift hips up and back, forming an inverted V shape with your body.

name: Single Leg Balance
description: A balance exercise that improves stability and proprioception.
instructions: Stand on one leg, lift other leg slightly off ground, hold balance for 30-60 seconds, then switch legs.

name: Treadmill Running
description: A cardiovascular exercise that improves endurance and burns calories.
instructions: Start at a comfortable pace, gradually increase speed, maintain good posture with arms swinging naturally.

name: Kettlebell Swing
description: A dynamic full-body exercise that builds power and cardiovascular fitness.
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, swing kettlebell between legs, then explosively drive hips forward to swing weight up.

name: Pilates Hundred
description: A classic Pilates exercise that strengthens the core and improves breathing.
instructions: Lie on back, lift head and shoulders off ground, extend legs at 45-degree angle, pump arms up and down 100 times.

name: Box Jump
description: A plyometric exercise that builds explosive power and cardiovascular fitness.
instructions: Stand in front of box, squat down, then explosively jump up onto box, landing softly with both feet.

name: Hamstring Stretch
description: A static stretch that improves hamstring flexibility and reduces injury risk.
instructions: Sit on ground with legs extended, reach forward toward toes, hold stretch for 30 seconds without bouncing.

name: Bosu Ball Squats
description: A balance exercise that challenges stability while building leg strength.
instructions: Stand on Bosu ball with dome side up, perform squats while maintaining balance on unstable surface.

name: Rowing Machine
description: A full-body cardio exercise that builds endurance and strength simultaneously.
instructions: Sit on rowing machine, push with legs first, then pull with arms, return to starting position in reverse order.

name: Resistance Band Rows
description: A strength exercise using resistance bands that targets the back muscles.
instructions: Anchor resistance band at chest height, step back to create tension, pull band toward chest while squeezing shoulder blades.

name: Hip Flexor Stretch
description: A stretch that improves hip flexibility and reduces lower back tension.
instructions: Kneel on one knee, step other foot forward, lean forward to feel stretch in front of back leg's hip.

name: Medicine Ball Slams
description: A dynamic exercise that builds power and releases stress through explosive movement.
instructions: Hold medicine ball overhead, slam it down to ground with force, catch it on bounce, repeat immediately.

name: Standing Calf Raises
description: A machine-based exercise that isolates and strengthens the calf muscles.
instructions: Stand on calf raise machine, place balls of feet on platform, raise heels up, then lower back down.

name: Jump Rope
description: A high-intensity cardio exercise that improves coordination and burns calories quickly.
instructions: Hold jump rope handles, swing rope overhead, jump over rope as it comes around, maintain rhythm.

name: Yoga Warrior Pose
description: A yoga pose that builds strength, balance, and focus.
instructions: Step one foot back, bend front knee, raise arms overhead, hold pose while maintaining balance.

name: Cable Woodchops
description: A rotational exercise that targets the core and improves functional movement patterns.
instructions: Stand sideways to cable machine, grip handle with both hands, rotate torso to bring weight across body.

name: Static Stretching Routine
description: A comprehensive stretching routine that improves overall flexibility and reduces muscle tension.
instructions: Hold each stretch for 30 seconds, breathe deeply, don't bounce, stretch to point of mild discomfort.

name: Stability Ball Crunches
description: A core exercise that uses a stability ball to increase range of motion and challenge balance.
instructions: Lie on stability ball with lower back supported, perform crunches while maintaining balance on ball.

name: Elliptical Training
description: A low-impact cardio exercise that provides a full-body workout without stressing joints.
instructions: Step onto elliptical, hold handles, maintain upright posture, push and pull with arms while stepping.

name: Tai Chi Basic Form
description: A gentle martial art that improves balance, coordination, and mental focus.
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, move slowly and deliberately through basic Tai Chi movements.

name: Battle Ropes
description: A high-intensity exercise that builds endurance and upper body strength.
instructions: Hold battle ropes with both hands, create wave-like motion by moving arms up and down rapidly.

name: Foam Rolling
description: A self-myofascial release technique that improves flexibility and reduces muscle soreness.
instructions: Roll foam roller over tight muscles, pause on tender spots, apply pressure for 30-60 seconds.

name: TRX Suspension Training
description: A suspension training system that uses body weight and gravity to build strength and stability.
instructions: Adjust straps to appropriate length, perform exercises while maintaining proper form and control.

name: Zumba Dance Fitness
description: A dance-based cardio workout that combines Latin and international music with dance moves.
instructions: Follow dance moves to the rhythm of the music, keep moving throughout the entire session.

name: Pilates Reformer
description: A Pilates machine that provides resistance training while improving core strength and flexibility.
instructions: Lie on reformer, secure feet in straps, perform controlled movements against spring resistance.

name: Standing Tree Pose
description: A yoga balance pose that improves focus, stability, and leg strength.
instructions: Stand on one leg, place other foot on inner thigh or calf, bring hands to prayer position, hold balance.

name: Cycling (Indoor)
description: A low-impact cardio exercise that builds leg strength and cardiovascular endurance.
instructions: Adjust seat height, maintain proper posture, pedal at consistent cadence, vary resistance for intensity.

name: Resistance Band Squats
description: A strength exercise using resistance bands to add resistance to bodyweight squats.
instructions: Stand on resistance band, hold handles at shoulders, perform squats while maintaining tension on band.

name: Dynamic Stretching
description: Active stretching that prepares muscles for movement and improves range of motion.
instructions: Perform controlled movements that take joints through their full range of motion, repeat 10-15 times each.

name: Stability Ball Bridge
description: A bridge variation that challenges balance and core stability while targeting the posterior chain.
instructions: Lie on back with feet on stability ball, lift hips up, maintain balance on ball while holding bridge position.
